title: Transfering pictures from Picasa
content: Since the new update 2025/06/18 I can no longer transfer pictures from Picasa3 to my email is there a solution? This just happened after the 06/18 installation.
creator: tom_stauffer

title: Encountering 10 -15 minute delay in receiving emails in Thunderbird via Yahoo mail via Cox ISP
content: 'Encountering 10 -15 minute delay in receiving emails in Thunderbird via Yahoo mailbold text. My ISP is Cox communications and with their conversion to Yahoo, using Thunderbird to view emails has not been timely.
creator: dpaged

title: thunderbird migration from windows 10 to windows 11
content:
I've moved thunderbird between windows 10 computers several times without any issues in the past, but I'm having problems now.

My old PC is running windows 10 with the most up to date TB. New machine has windows 11.

In the past, it was just a case of installing TB on the new machine and replacing the profile folder there with the one from the old machine.

Now when I do this I get "your thunderbird profile could not be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible"

Ay help with this woould be much appreciated
creator: firefoxsync48

title: Mozilla no longer receiving or sendng messages
content: I open Mozilla Tbird and there are no new messages since the 16th. today is the 22nd. I tied to test it by sending myself a message and got a message that the SMTP serverf had "timed out!".

title: I can't send Google-Emails via Thunderbird
content: A few months ago I got the problem that when trying to send via gmail this is rejected with the message that the connection with the SMTP-server takes too long. What can be the reason for?
creator: muenchen-schwabing

title: Body text of emails lost and also no forwarding possible of all emails in local folder based on a NAS
content:
Hi there I tried many solutions that I found concerning body text not displayed. But hat no success. Let me describe in detail. From one day to the other the following happened. 1. Emails in the local folder stored on a NAS (for archive purposes) did no longer display the body text (from one day to the next) However I could still transfer them into the corresponding inbox and then read them. 2. Upon trying to change settings, reinstalling the newest version of Thunderbird and also an older version, the solution of putting the emails into the inbox and reading them or forwarding them to another account does no longer work What I tried: 

      1. Repair the Folder:       2. Rebuild the Global Database:       3. Check for Add-on Conflicts:       4. Verify Account Settings:       5. Examine Local Folders Storage:

Now my knowledge is depleted and I am looking for help. Thanks in advance. nelexc
creator: nelexc

title: password
content: Thunderbird keeps asking for password every time I connect to Thunderbird. One solution online said to go into settings, then security, on the password part it says to delete your password in saved passwords, click ok and then restart Thunderbird. The password I have is the same for my BT account and access to my BT emails. If I delete this password in Thunderbird will it affect the password to my BT account or is it just for Thunderbird?
creator: jbrod.fraser
